title: Effect of Varying Threshold for Self-Training
description: This lab illustrates the effect of varying threshold on self-training. The `breast_cancer` dataset is loaded, and labels are deleted such that only 50 out of 569 samples have labels. A `SelfTrainingClassifier` is fitted on this dataset, with varying thresholds.
